ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cshwrepswhash1.m | |- M = { w e. Word V | E. n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( W cyclShift n ) = w } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_cshwsiun | |- ( W e. Word V -> M = U_ n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) { ( W cyclShift n ) } ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) e. _V |
| 4 |  | #P_snex | |- { ( W cyclShift n ) } e. _V |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( W e. Word V -> { ( W cyclShift n ) } e. _V ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ralrimivw | |- ( W e. Word V -> A. n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) { ( W cyclShift n ) } e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_iunexg | |- ( ( ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) e. _V /\ A. n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) { ( W cyclShift n ) } e. _V ) -> U_ n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) { ( W cyclShift n ) } e. _V ) |
| 8 | 3, 6, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( W e. Word V -> U_ n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) { ( W cyclShift n ) } e. _V ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( W e. Word V -> M e. _V ) |
